alert.note: Alert for Greene (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 25 at 2:56AM EDT until August 25 at 3:30AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 AM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN GREENE...SOUTH CENTRAL FAYETTE...MONONGALIA... NORTHERN PRESTON AND NORTHEASTERN MARION COUNTIES... At 255 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Farmington to near Pleasant Valley, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Morgantown, Fairmont, Westover, Kingwood, Star City, Winfield, Farmington, Point Marion, Granville, Fairview, Newburg, Brookhaven, Cassville, Fairchance, Rivesville, Grant Town, Reedsville, Masontown, Albright, and Markleysburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
